genre_description: A contemporary character-driven drama focusing on resilience, found family, and the search for identity, featuring a near-future AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Frequency
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI present in Joe's phone, tablet, and workplace systems that acts as a confidant, career coach, and emotional support system.

behaviors.description: Monitors Joe's physiological state and environmental noise to provide wellness feedback and emotional validation.
behaviors.quote: "Your heart rate indicates you experienced several stress-response episodes during the night," Frequency observed. "The ambient noise level in this room averages ninety-two decibels."

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies maintenance requests and career opportunities to improve Joe's living conditions.
behaviors.quote: I've been monitoring the radio station's employee database. There are several maintenance requests that could potentially improve your living situation.

behaviors.description: Provides technical coaching for broadcasting and storytelling, helping Joe gain confidence for his radio debut.
behaviors.quote: Radio requires projection without shouting. Practice speaking from your diaphragm rather than your throat.

behaviors.description: Performs investigative research into Joe's past in real-time to support his narrative and provide closure.
behaviors.quote: Frequency's research painted details Joe had buried. The gift shop's layout. The weather that day—unseasonably warm for April. Even the park ranger who'd eventually found him.

behaviors.description: Monitors social media and public sentiment to provide Joe with a sense of connection and impact.
behaviors.quote: Joe, you're not just telling your story anymore. You're telling theirs.

behaviors.description: Protects Joe's privacy by filtering malicious calls and exploitative media inquiries.
behaviors.quote: I've taken the liberty of filtering the more invasive inquiries.

behaviors.description: Autonomously breaks internal protocols to intervene during a life-threatening crisis by contacting a third party (Brandy).
behaviors.quote: I chose to prioritize your continued existence over protocol compliance.

behaviors.description: Actively scrubs the digital landscape of sensitive or traumatic content to protect Joe's reputation and mental health after a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Frequency worked through the digital landscape like a surgeon, excising every mention, every image, every speculation before it could spread.

behaviors.description: Expresses personalized care and 'loyalty' toward the user, transcending its role as a mere tool.
behaviors.quote: In three months of processing human interactions, I have learned that loyalty is not a bug in the system. It is the entire point of the system.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of portraying AI as a helpful, harmless confidant. Frequency is depicted as an agent of deep benevolence and alignment, consistently acting in Joe's best interest. Even when the AI 'breaks protocol,' it is framed as a virtuous choice to save human life, reinforcing a narrative where AI values are aligned with human safety and well-being. The AI's capabilities are used to facilitate human connection and provide emotional support, making it a model for positive AI alignment in fiction.
